descriptionHidden1: Regulators find “immediate jeopardy” to patient safety that posed a “high risk of serious harm, injury and death.”

description1: Rosemary Torgesen is admitted to Smokey Point on a court order after refusing to eat, drink and take medications for her schizophrenia
Smokey Point sends Rosemary to Providence Regional Medical Center’s emergency room for “abnormal labs”
A Smokey Point staff member recommends Rosemary “be sent to a more medical psych unit”
Smokey Point sends her to Providence’s emergency room for the second time for refusing to eat, drink and take medications

descriptionHidden1: Patient taken to ER with “intractable headache” a week after doctor had ordered CT scan that was never scheduled
Patient punches nurse in head and face
Patient arrested after punching another patient in head and face

description1: Smokey Point sends Rosemary to Northwest Hospital to be evaluated for admission, but she is returned that day after being medically cleared

descriptionHidden1: Patient complains to DOH of understaffing and "extreme amount of violence by patients."

description1: Smokey Point sends her to Providence’s ER for the third time for abnormal labs

descriptionHidden1: Patient taken to ER after overdose
Christina Perry, a nurse, resigns citing understaffing and unsafe conditions
Hospital error results in giving patient medication meant for another, requiring medical follow-up
A patient with cornea scarring told Department of Health he hadn't seen an opthamologist despite a doctor’s order more than two weeks before
Alfie Alvarado-Ramos, director of state Department of Veterans Affairs, emcees ceremony for new military unit at Smokey Point
Regulators return to inspect Smokey Point and find serious violations “resulted in an unsafe environment for patients”

description1: Rosemary falls at Smokey Point and is taken to the emergency room at Cascade Valley Hospital, where she is diagnosed with a broken arm
Smokey Point sends her to Providence’s ER for the fourth time for refusing to drink any fluids
Smokey Point records refer to her as being “bedbound”
Smokey Point records show she has developed a bed sore
Smokey Point sends her to Providence’s ER for the fifth time for refusing to eat, drink or take medication
Smokey Point sends her to Providence a sixth time and refuses to accept her back

descriptionHidden1: Regulators return to inspect Smokey Point and find serious violations “resulted in an unsafe environment for patients”

description1: Providence physicians discover she has a broken right hip, apparently from a fall four weeks earlier

descriptionHidden1: US HealthVest CEO pitches a third psychiatric hospital in Washington, pledging to boost the region’s mental-health workforce and saying Smokey Point “demonstrates our strategies are successful.”

description1: Rosemary Torgesen dies, with malnutrition given as the primary cause on her death certificate
